sentence: But of the eight USFL draft picks who have some connection to the Steelers, the one who came into the NFL with the most fanfare—at least in terms of draft pedigree—was cornerback Brian Allen.
author: Jason Zasky
title: Former Steelers Fifth-Round Pick Drafted by Birmingham Stallions

sentence: Both have free agents of their own to worry about, whether it's edge-rusher Von Miller and center Brian Allen in Los Angeles or linebacker De'Vondre Campbell and cornerback Rasul Douglas in Green Bay.
author: Gary Davenport
title: Tom Brady Is Back, but the Buccaneers Are Far from Super Bowl Favorites

sentence: Secondary Market: James Daniels, Andrew Norwell, Ben Jones, Austin Corbett, Brian Allen Behind Daniels, there isn’t a clear long-term option in this group.
author: Steven Ruiz
title: The Complete Guide to 2022 NFL Free Agency

sentence: Since Monday, when teams could start negotiating with other teams’ free agents, the Rams have not announced any acquisitions, while they’ve re-signed tackle Joe Noteboom – groomed as retiring left tackle Andrew Whitworth’s successor – and center Brian Allen and guard-center Coleman Shelton.
author: Kevin Modesti
title: Rams lose Von Miller after Bills come with cash

sentence: — Mike Garafolo (@MikeGarafolo) March 15, 2022 Strange can also come in as insurance and provide a valuable backup for the resigned Brian Allen at center.
author: Lorenzo Reyna
title: NFL Draft Analyst Identifies ‘Perfect Fit’ for Rams’ Scheme in 2022
